channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter bin has not been emptied - Bus stop G Nightingale Place, 18th October
item.description:
This bin has been missed for empting. for over a week. As last reported now spilling onto South Circular road and pavement. If it had been emptied this extra cleaning would not be needed!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Engineer Close, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter bins full outside Family Store on Hindmans Road, 18th October
item.description:

item.title: Car thieves fly tipping on council car park, 18th October
item.description:
Still happening on the Wayman Court counci Estate and council workers carpark. Car thieves are tipping out all of the personal items - log books, baby seats, glove compartment items. Police have been informed. No action taken. This is at least a weekly
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Navarino Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Refuse, 18th October
item.description:
The refuse bin out side the main entrance to 9 to 10 Odette House has the lid shut and nobody can open it to get rid of their refuse as the lid is closed, the lid should be open as elderly people cannot open it, as it in an enclosed area, this is the second week this has happened, I am 80 and I cant open it so I am stuck with refuse at home.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Hamilton Road, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
